title: Channel24.co.za | LOL! Suzelle DIY kills it in this quick and quirky question game!
text:
LOL! Suzelle DIY kills it in this quick and quirky question game! 2015-10-19 12:21 
Cape Town – Suzelle DIY on Monday popped in at our office to promote the launch of her hot new book appropriately titled; Suzelle DIY – The Book ! 
The South African queen of DIY has been on a whirlwind tour across the country to create some serious hype around her latest project. 
The book, which is available in all good book stores , will make a fabulous Christmas gift! 
You'll be glad to know that even Marianne and Bakkies have their own chapter in Suzelle’s handy and humorous DIY guide! 
Suzelle sat down for a quick fire game of HELL YEAH or OH NO in which we asked her 9 questions that she had to answer in a flash! 
Check out the results here: 
1) Have you ever been arrested? 
2) Do you sing in the shower? 
3) Would you go on a road trip with Marianne? 
4) Would you let Bakkies sleep on your bed? 
5) Would you ever cut your hair? 
6) Have you bought your Christmas gifts yet? 
(Suzelle says she made hers) 
7) Would you go to a One Direction concert? 
8) Would you invite Die Antwoord to a braai? 
9) Would you do a Christmas duet with Nataniël? 
Watch out for Suzelle DIY's interview with News24Live 's Jennifer Sanasie coming soon.
